pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to 'Lp_solve' v. 5.5 to Solve Linear/Integer Programs // Lp_solve is freely available (under LGPL 2) software for solving linear, integer and mixed integer programs. In this implementation we supply a "wrapper" function in C and some R functions that solve general linear/integer problems, assignment problems, and transportation problems. This version calls lp_solve version 5.5.
